totals.sql: select sum( cast( pobtot as numeric ) ) as "Población total", sum( cast( pobmas as numeric ) ) as "Población masculina", sum( cast( pobfem as numeric ) ) as "Población femenina", sum( cast( vivtot as numeric ) ) as "Total viviendas", sum( cast( tvivhab as numeric ) ) as "Total viviendas habitadas", sum( cast( pob0_14 as numeric ) )as "Población de 0 a 14 años", sum( cast( pob15_64 as numeric ) ) as "Población de 15 a 65 años", sum( cast( pob65_mas as numeric ) ) as "Población de 65 años y mas" from datosestadisticos.ent THEWHERE

select sum( cast( pobtot as numeric ) ) as "Población total", sum( cast( pobmas as numeric ) ) as "Población masculina", sum( cast( pobfem as numeric ) ) as "Población femenina", sum( cast( vivtot as numeric ) ) as "Total viviendas", sum( cast( tvivhab as numeric ) ) as "Total viviendas habitadas", sum( cast( pob0_14 as numeric ) )as "Población de 0 a 14 años", sum( cast( pob15_64 as numeric ) ) as "Población de 15 a 65 años", sum( cast( pob65_mas as numeric ) ) as "Población de 65 años y mas" from datosestadisticos.mun THEWHERE

select sum( cast( pobtot as numeric ) ) as "Población total", sum( cast( pobmas as numeric ) ) as "Población masculina", sum( cast( pobfem as numeric ) ) as "Población femenina", sum( cast( vivtot as numeric ) ) as "Total viviendas", sum( cast( tvivhab as numeric ) ) as "Total viviendas habitadas", sum( cast( pob0_14 as numeric ) )as "Población de 0 a 14 años", sum( cast( pob15_64 as numeric ) ) as "Población de 15 a 65 años", sum( cast( pob65_mas as numeric ) ) as "Población de 65 años y mas" from datosestadisticos.locurb THEWHERE

select sum( cast( pobtot as numeric ) ) as "Población total", sum( cast( pobmas as numeric ) ) as "Población masculina", sum( cast( pobfem as numeric ) ) as "Población femenina", sum( cast( vivtot as numeric ) ) as "Total viviendas", sum( cast( tvivhab as numeric ) ) as "Total viviendas habitadas", sum( cast( pob0_14 as numeric ) )as "Población de 0 a 14 años", sum( cast( pob15_64 as numeric ) ) as "Población de 15 a 65 años", sum( cast( pob65_mas as numeric ) ) as "Población de 65 años y mas" from datosestadisticos.locrur THEWHERE
